title: Curious if this Warrants Chat Restriction. Had an Intentional feeder who flamed me and I smiled.
body:
I had a Kha who flamed me and I smiled in response. He said "smile again and I int your lane", so I smiled and got flamed for provoking him. He also told our mid laner to kill themselves before this. 

Game 1
In-Game
Grayconnor: xerath,
Grayconnor: why are you pushing
Grayconnor: solo
Grayconnor: ???
Grayconnor: :)
Grayconnor: :)
Grayconnor: :)
Grayconnor: I said ":)"
Grayconnor: He flamed me and I smiled lol
Grayconnor: :)
Grayconnor: its all good, can't do much about 5 years olds playing games
Grayconnor: just 9x kha, thank you
Grayconnor: I smiled to flame
Grayconnor: lol
Grayconnor: you are the type of guy to say "she asked for it" because she is wearing a crop top
Grayconnor: he already did lol
Grayconnor: this is not winnable
Grayconnor: I THROW WHAT LEAD????
Grayconnor: I want to be out of this shit ass game with an inter
Grayconnor: its over
Grayconnor: move on
Grayconnor: let them destroy our nexusa
Grayconnor: what is cp?
Grayconnor: I did give up
Grayconnor: because we have an inter
Grayconnor: that is game over bud
Grayconnor: move on
Grayconnor: BIG FACTs
Grayconnor: xerath flamed me for leaving bot so you can end
Grayconnor: called me a quitting noob
Grayconnor: just keep going bot please
Grayconnor: you 1 shot him
Grayconnor: inter and 3 people with 10 deaths is winnable bro
Grayconnor: only noob ff with a literal intentional feeder who is doing everything they can to eensure we lose
Grayconnor: :)
Grayconnor: I  love how Qiyana said "ez you provoked him" after kha said "kill yourself qiyana"
Grayconnor: qiyana and xerath are defending kha, because I smiled
Grayconnor: I literally smiled when he flamed me

replies.body: No you wont get banned for smiling. It was all the negative bullshit after it that got you punished. Dont argue over nonsense in the middle of a match.

Grayconnor: its all good, can't do much about 5 years olds playing games
Grayconnor: just 9x kha, thank you
Grayconnor: I smiled to flame
Grayconnor: lol
Grayconnor: you are the type of guy to say "she asked for it" because she is wearing a crop top
Grayconnor: he already did lol
Grayconnor: this is not winnable
Grayconnor: I THROW WHAT LEAD????
Grayconnor: I want to be out of this shit ass game with an inter
Grayconnor: its over
Grayconnor: move on
Grayconnor: let them destroy our nexusa


you admitted to giving up the game... you cussed.. called people children...

chat restriction is warranted.. 

When your restriction is over... before you hit the chat button again.. think about if what your going to say is going to help your team.  If not.. it will be a ban next time..

Good luck.

> [{quoted}](name=IVSakenz,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=5Ram93EM,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2020-02-03T20:16:01.217+0000)
>
> Grayconnor: its all good, can't do much about 5 years olds playing games
> Grayconnor: just 9x kha, thank you
> Grayconnor: I smiled to flame
> Grayconnor: lol
> Grayconnor: you are the type of guy to say "she asked for it" because she is wearing a crop top
> Grayconnor: he already did lol
> Grayconnor: this is not winnable
> Grayconnor: I THROW WHAT LEAD????
> Grayconnor: I want to be out of this shit ass game with an inter
> Grayconnor: its over
> Grayconnor: move on
> Grayconnor: let them destroy our nexusa
> 
> 
> you admitted to giving up the game... you cussed.. called people children...
> 
> chat restriction is warranted.. 
> 
> When your restriction is over... before you hit the chat button again.. think about if what your going to say is going to help your team.  If not.. it will be a ban next time..
> 
> Good luck.

This is literally what's wrong with league right now. Hurt feelings reports.

I also finished the game with highest farm, I just stopped going to the lane with kha inting. Calling someone a child is not bannable either. The game has a chat filter so cussing at nobody and just, in general, makes no sense as a negative comment. My profanities were about the game, the person was saying "you deserve this" because I smiled, hence calling him a child. He is not banned and I got chat restricted. He told someone to kill themselve. Because he was queued with more people than I was and I got 3 reports from his friends and him I get restricted and he is scott free.

> [{quoted}](name=Grayconnor,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=5Ram93EM,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2020-02-03T20:40:09.559+0000)
>
> I also finished the game with highest farm, I just stopped going to the lane with kha inting. Calling someone a child is not bannable either. The game has a chat filter so cussing at nobody and just, in general, makes no sense as a negative comment. My profanities were about the game, the person was saying "you deserve this" because I smiled, hence calling him a child. He is not banned and I got chat restricted. He told someone to kill themselve. Because he was queued with more people than I was and I got 3 reports from his friends and him I get restricted and he is scott free.

none of this has anything to do with anything.. 

a. calling someone any name.. including a child is most definitely bannable.. maybe you should go read the rules for clarification..you do not even need to call them something at all.. just arguing in chat is bannable...
b. because there is a filter does not give you free reign to cuss. it is not helpful to any situation..
c. it is not a thing that he had more people reporting then you .. 1 report works the same as 10.. and how do you know that said person did not also get a chat ban or even worse?  you are making an assumption with nothing to back it up.
d.  no matter what anyone else did.. it does not excuse your own actions.(I really do not understand why so many people have a hard time with this one.)  You do not get to get off "scott" free because he "started" it.. or he said worse things.  Life does not work that way.. you are still responsible for your own part.

> [{quoted}](name=Grayconnor,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=5Ram93EM,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2020-02-03T20:40:09.559+0000)
>
> I also finished the game with highest farm, I just stopped going to the lane with kha inting. Calling someone a child is not bannable either. The game has a chat filter so cussing at nobody and just, in general, makes no sense as a negative comment. My profanities were about the game, the person was saying "you deserve this" because I smiled, hence calling him a child. He is not banned and I got chat restricted. He told someone to kill themselve. Because he was queued with more people than I was and I got 3 reports from his friends and him I get restricted and he is scott free.

Yeah it is actually. Insulting players is against the rules. Cussing actually isnt against the rules, so dont be afraid to swear. Idc about your opinion about that, and Im not gonna get into my opinion either. But its important to know what is and isnt against the rules, so there you go. Definitely go read them, or else you may lose your account out of ignorance, which is the dumbest way to go when all the information is available lol.

Also, think of it like this; each account has a hidden toxicity meter attached to it. You can break the rules and fill that meter up to 80%, not get punished. Another player can break the rules in the exact same way, and get punished because their meter was already at 80% and that offense filled it the rest of the way.
How is calling someone 5 an insult? Like what if they are actually 5?

> [{quoted}](name=Grayconnor,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=5Ram93EM,comment-id=00000001000000010000,timestamp=2020-02-04T04:18:14.857+0000)
>
> How is calling someone 5 an insult? Like what if they are actually 5?

Well, why did you call them a child? Dont play dumb. You meant it to be condescending to point out his immaturity. What if you call someone a fat ass and they actually are a fat ass? No longer an insult right? Ppffffft. Dont give me that fake innocent bullshit. No ones gonna buy that lol unless its a 5 year old ;)
I hope you don't deal with inters. good luck fam.
There's a lot more than ":)" in that chat log. It was the constant argument and harassment that got you chat restricted.

So the system punishes based on consistency  x severity. Meaning you can be punished for 1 game of extreme toxicity or many games of mild toxicity. 

> [{quoted}](name=Grayconnor,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=5Ram93EM,comment-id=,timestamp=2020-02-03T19:44:12.116+0000)
>
> Grayconnor: I  love how Qiyana said "ez you provoked him" after kha said "kill yourself qiyana"

This is the most severe part of your logs.  Don't go repeating zero tolerance phrases, it will get you banned. If you didn't get 14-day banned from this,  consider yourself **VERY** lucky.

The rest of the stuff like asking for reports is minor, but remember that if you kept doing it often enough, it will punish you as well.
So quoting something is against the rules?

Yes for ZT, no for ML. 

Besides, there really is no need to repeat what others say. You already know what they say isn't nice, why would you go repeating it? 

It's not like the enemy knowing what someone said and reporting that person will get people punished any faster (or likelier) with more people reporting them.
More reports does lead to a quicker and likelier ban

[That's a common misconception](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/9VrUtrJo-being-solo-and-having-a-team-report?comment=000000000002)

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Tantram,realm=NA,timestamp=2014-02-03T22:46:50.973+0000)
>
> Multiple reports do NOT increase the likelihood of flagging a game for review. One report is all it takes. There is no benefit to asking for others to report a player.

Of course. If something is against the rules, then it's against the rules.

If you thought it was unpleasant to read, then so does the IFS.

Why would you consider repeating it anyway? Does it help your team win the game?
Yes

Dude the guy who "inted" your game had more damage , more gold , more ward placed , more kills , more assists and almost more farm than you ... And you saying he inted whole game...
Dude even the support doubled your damage and you was the adc...
If you were a mod you could see logs. Good luck in life brother!

> [{quoted}](name=Grayconnor,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=5Ram93EM,comment-id=,timestamp=2020-02-03T19:44:12.116+0000)
>
> I had a Kha who flamed me and I smiled in response. He said "smile again and I int your lane", so I smiled and got flamed for provoking him. He also told our mid laner to kill themselves before this. 
> 
> Game 1
> In-Game

> Grayconnor: its all good, can't do much about 5 years olds playing games
> Grayconnor: **just 9x kha**, thank you

OP, you can't ask for reports. It gets you punished. {{sticker:cass-cry}} 

> Grayconnor: let them destroy our nexusa
> Grayconnor: what is cp?
> Grayconnor: I did give up
> Grayconnor: because we have an inter

Can't give up if your teammates aren't all willing to. Just do what you can, if you can't do anything- atleast don't encourage others to give up. They can report you for 'Giving up'. {{sticker:leblanc-funny}} 

> Grayconnor: xerath flamed me for leaving bot so you can end
> Grayconnor: called me a quitting noob
> Grayconnor: just keep going bot please
> Grayconnor: you 1 shot him
> Grayconnor: inter and 3 people with 10 deaths is winnable bro
> Grayconnor: only noob ff with a literal intentional feeder who is doing everything they can to eensure we lose
> Grayconnor: :)
> Grayconnor: I  love how Qiyana said "ez you provoked him" after kha said "kill yourself qiyana"

Don't argue with people! It doesn't help you. Doesn't help them. And it doesn't help ya'll win the match. Its best to agree to disagree and just mute each other. If all you said was a _:)_ after his flame, nothing would happen to you! Just saying. Don't copy/paste ZT words even if someone else said those to you. 

Good luck with the future games, I hope that you aren't punished again. {{sticker:galio-happy}}

Don't listen to the snowflakes, you did get punished for this. Never quote that 

Grayconnor: I love how Qiyana said "ez you provoked him" after kha said "kill yourself qiyana"
if that was the case, he would have been banned, not chat-restricted
